name: Time Knight VS. Zombies
description:
Time Knight VS. Zombies is an action and adventure game where you control a knight who must confront a horde of extraterrestrial zombies and other monsters seeking to seize the past through time portals in order to control the future.

Divided into over 70 levels and four difficulty levels: easy, normal, hard, and yolo, as well as two additional levels, normal+ and hard+, which can be unlocked by completing the normal and hard difficulty modes, respectively. You will navigate through random environments with different missions each time you launch the game.

Testing your nerves in a race against the clock, where your protection time is limited to 30 seconds, strategize to improve your score by utilizing time bonuses and eliminating enemies. Every 3 levels, access the space-time store to purchase lives or additional time with the collected coins. Choose from the available 10 weapons or even adopt Buddy, a loyal coin-hungry dog.

Receive a note on your performance at the end of each stage !
